alert.note: Alert for East Slopes Sacramento Mountains Below 7500 Feet; Sacramento Mountains Above 7500 Feet (New Mexico) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS El Paso (Southern New Mexico and extreme Western Texas)
info.headline: Wind Advisory issued January 12 at 1:22AM MST until January 13 at 5:00PM MST by NWS El Paso
info.description: ...WIND ADVISORY NOW IN EFFECT UNTIL 5 PM MST SATURDAY... * WHAT...West winds 25 to 35 mph with gusts up to 50 mph. * WHERE...Sacramento Mountains above 7500 feet and east slopes. * WHEN...Until 5 PM MST Saturday. * IMPACTS...Hazardous driving conditions due to reduced visibility. Gusty winds could blow around unsecured objects. Tree limbs could be blown down and a few power outages may result.
info.instruction: Use extra caution when driving, especially if operating a high profile vehicle. Secure outdoor objects.

area.areaDesc: East Slopes Sacramento Mountains Below 7500 Feet; Sacramento Mountains Above 7500 Feet
